meanings.definition: Used to express disgust or contempt.
meanings.sent1: Pfui! That rotten smell makes me sick.
meanings.sent2: Oh pfui! I can't believe you would do such a thing.
meanings.sent3: Pfui! That spoiled milk is not fit for anyone to drink.
meanings.sent4: The garbage piled up in the summer heat, emitting a pfui odor.
meanings.sent5: The slimy texture of the food made her exclaim 'pfui!' in disgust.

meanings.definition: An exclamation of disapproval or dismissal.
meanings.sent1: Pfui! I don't want to hear any more of your lies.
meanings.sent2: Well, pfui to your rude behavior!
meanings.sent3: Pfui! Your excuses are as flimsy as a paper boat in a storm.
meanings.sent4: The idea was met with a resounding pfui from the entire group.
meanings.sent5: The audience responded with a loud pfui to the politician's insincere speech.
